title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: Bitcoin Suisse, Series B 2019 notes:4x Bitcoin Suisse BTC notes, Series B 20194x Bitcoin Suisse ETH notes, Series B 20192x Bitcoin Suisse BSV notes, Series B 20192x Bitcoin Suisse BCH notes, Series B 20191x Bitcoin Suisse XCHF note, Series B 2019*Bids are for all 13 notes in 1 lot*STARTING BID: 0.0350BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.0005BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: APRIL 23rd, 2023, 15:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED

comments.author: Suzuki Matt
comments.body: If the lot is split I would be interested in some of them. Thanks.

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: Suzuki Matt on April 22, 2023, 01:01:37 AMIf the lot is split I would be interested in some of them. Thanks. Will keep that in mind if no one bidsEnds in about 9.5 hours

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Ended with no bidsWill reauction in smaller lots
